name: DomainTools Iris
description: Use the DomainTools Iris Investigate API to profile domain names, get risk scores, and find connected domains that share the same Whois details, web hosting profiles, SSL certificates, and more. Looking for playbooks to go with DomainTools data? We've got you covered: https://github.com/DomainTools/playbooks/tree/master/Splunk%20Phantom

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity
Evaluates the risk of a given domain
Find domains connected by any supported Iris search parameter

status.description: return domains of this registration type

data_updated_after.description: Iris records that were updated on or after midnight on this date, in YYYY-MM-DD format or relative options ( 'today', 'yesterday' )

tld.description: Limit results to only include domains in a specific top-level domain (i.e. “tld=com” or “tld=ru”)

create_date.description: Only include domains created on a specific date, in YYYY-MM-DD format or relative options ( 'today', 'yesterday' )

expiration_date.description: Only include domains expiring on a specific date, in YYYY-MM-DD format or relative options ( 'today', 'yesterday' )
